captions.text:
Propose to that saucey someone with a custom
nintendo cartridge ring from your Companion

Cube ring box, and if they say no...game over...cuff
links.
I'm Jake and this is episode #10 of Game LÜT.

If you're walking around, stash your Portable
Sega Genesis in your Hadoken hoodie, straighten

your 59fifty Super Mario hat, and look for
this awesome 25th Anniversary Metal Gear Solid
Action Figure.

But if you get lost, check your replica Pip-Boy
or be like Aleator777 and build a functional
one...
Then create this full scale GlaDOS papercraft...

Since it'll be a huge success, celebrate with
a Portal cake and get it out of the oven with

a Power Mitt. If you make a mess, wear a Who's
Your Daddy bib and wash off with some Legend
of Zelda Rupee soap.

Relax with some Neo Geo games on your custom
wood console and a plush controller by Adafruit.

Then get ready for bed by putting on your
glow in the dark Pikachu shirt and Mega Man
costume...that is also a pillow.

But if you don't want to sleep ever, play
Eyes, a free and terrifying horror game. In

the game you have to loot a house but the
atmosphere and ghosts make for an awesome
time.

Then turn your eyes towards these amazing
video game posters by William Henry...

Create your own art with Minecraft magnets
and invite some friends over for Pokemonopoly.

Give the champion their own Grand Theft Auto
kubrick set like these ones from Vice City,
San Andreas or GTA 3.

But lets go on a trip to Hyrule with these
incredible travel prints by Gamer Print...

On your Journey, save your progress on a Video
Game hard drive. 8bit memory turns old game

cartridges, controllers and Game Boys into
really cool portable storage devices.

Go into battle with this Fallout 3 Brotherhood
of Steel helmet, subscribe to Vsauce3 for

more Game LÜT and whether you're beautiful
or somber, there's always a loot for you.

Links to everything can be found in the description
below.
I'm Jake and as always, thanks for watching.
